name: Steppers
description:
Default steppers used in the platform. Use this too hook into certain steps.

Example :
providers: [{
  provide: HOOK_STEPPER,
  useValue: {
     id: Steppers.SETUP,
     label: 'Register devices',
     component: YourRegisterDeviceForm,
     priority: -1000
  },
  multi: true
}]
